title: Longfellow House Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety        Longfellow House-Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site is located in a suburban neighborhood in Cambridge, MA. Care should be taken crossing streets and on uneven side walks. There are paths throughout the site and garden, but ground may be uneven in places. Tours through the house require standing for long periods of time, walking through narrow spaces, and climbing stairs unless notification is given to the ranger.
